Choose the correct word to complete the following sentence : The speaker said that her organization wanted to _________ a major change in the party 's platform .

Choose the conjugation that expresses an arranged future . Welke zin drukt uit dat `` alle regelingen getroffen zijn '' ? Choisissez la forme qui exprime que tout est deja arrange . We ... our new model on the trade fair in Paris next week .

Choose the conjugation that expresses a decision at the moment of speaking . Kies de vervoeging die `` een beslissing hier en nu '' uitdrukt . Choisissez la conjugaison qui exprime une decision prise au moment ou on parle . John has arrived , Melanie . - OK , I ... to the reception to meet him .
Choose the appropriate conjugation to express a fixed arrangement in the future . We ___________ our new model at next week 's trade fair in Paris .
